code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getItems,addToCart}from'../api/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Items(_ref){let{token}=_ref;const[items,setItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{loadItems();},[]);const loadItems=async()=>{const data=await getItems();setItems(data);};const handleAddToCart=async itemId=>{try{await addToCart([itemId],token);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to add to cart:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.name," - ",item.status,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAddToCart(item.id),children:"Add to Cart"})]},item.id))})]});}export default Items;
